refnamediv.refpurpose: A terminal-interface to manage serial audio feeds from services like Podiobooks.com.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: svterm allows the user of a serial audio feed service to manage its subscriptions. Select from update, format, subscribe, release, browse to begin a task. Each task may also ask for additional information before performance. Each task will loop over itself till you enter a blank line.
